item.title: FHN
item.description: score:353 Chances: First Horizon Corp. recognized as one of America’s Best Large Employers by Forbes Magazine. Broyhill Asset Management’s second-quarter 2023 investor letter discussing portfolio performance. Five-year employment agreement announced with CEO Bryan Jordan following a failed acquisition effort by TD Bank. Recognition of First Horizon Corp.

item.title: MRO
item.description: score:-83 Chances: Marathon Oil’s positive adjusted free cash flow and strong net operating cash flow could signal financial stability. Beating earnings and revenue surprises for the second quarter might boost investor confidence. The declaration of a dividend and consistent net income performance could attract dividend-focused investors.
